name: Lost Keys
description:
Find the keys to open all doors, destroy bombs and dodge obstacles and dangers along the way.

Dangers

Face the dangers.

Courage

Have no fear.

Obstacles

Overcome obstacles.

Puzzles

Solve the puzzles.

Mechanisms

Scenario interaction.

Destroy the Bombs

Destroy the bombs using the stones on the way.

Find the Keys

Each level has 6 lost keys.

Exit

Open the last door.
